Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2019...
Traded from Brooklyn to Detroit on 3/2/2019 (Going to BRO: 1B Ron Hall. Going to DET: C Manuel Rodarte)...
Injured on 5/23/2019 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 7/11/2019, off Jerry Engstrom (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/6/2019, off Matthew Gordillo (CIN)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2020, hitting .409 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2021, hitting .333 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Injured on 7/14/2022 with a Fractured Ulna, out for 4-5 weeks...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,642,857 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2023, hitting .379 with 5 HR, 14 RBI...
Injured on 6/6/2023 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from Detroit to St. Louis (C) on 7/5/2023 (Going to DET: C James Desir, LF Daniel Delee, P Anselmo Herrera, 3B Christopher Meehan, 2B James Gallucci. Going to STL: C Manuel Rodarte, 3B Cedr
ick Fernandez, P Benjamin Haupt)...
Injured on 8/9/2023 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2023...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,642,857 through salary arbitration...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Detroit on 7/30/2024 (Going to DET: C Manuel Rodarte. Going to STL: P Douglas Combs, LF James Ostrowski, C Todd Lichtenstein)...
